name: eTABU Word Search
description:
Cross out boredom from your vocabulary!

New game from eTABU series which helps you increase your perception and reflex. eTABU Word Search combines simple rules and epic fun. Find all of the words associated with the keyword. The sooner you do this, the more point you earn. Compete with your friends and beat the record!

You can have fun in English, German, Polish, Turkish, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Greek, Russian language and enriching your vocabulary!

Disclaimer:
eTABU Wykreślanka / Word Search is not associated with Hasbro or Hersch and Company's Taboo, Tabou, Tabu, Tabù, or any other variants of the Taboo products, registered trademarks.
